name: DeskDirector - SSL Certificate update - AWS - ACM

description.content:
https://lancom.itglue.com/5596/docs/6089710#documentMode=edit&version=draft
- Log into AWS - assume DD role.
- View the certificate currently used by the load balancer
- note down the arn details

- Check certificates in this region ACM
- view status of the cert use arn to confirm, which you got from the last step : https://docs.aws.amazon.com/acm/latest/userguide/check-certificate-renewal-status.html

- View the certificate currently used by the load balancer
- note down the arn details

- Check certificates in this region ACM
- view status of the cert use arn to confirm, which you got from the last step : https://docs.aws.amazon.com/acm/latest/userguide/check-certificate-renewal-status.html
based on the status of them both - ensure they're either in-progress renewing and you can re-schedule to check later OR already renewed.
Update the CW configuration for both Certificates under their corresponding regions and LB's
